Name: Death Slayer V
About the game: Death Slayer V is a single player, first person zombie shooter set in a beautiful open world. Please have a look at the minimum requirements before downloading to ensure that this game will run smoothly on your PC. Unfolding Plot A virus has escaped a secret lab run by the Eibmoz Corporation. Everyone is infected... including yourself. You have minutes before you die from the fast acting virus and turn into a 'Zombie'. There may be a way to stay alive... but it won't be easy! You find a syringe with an antidote that will only keep the virus at bay for minutes at a time and has to be mixed with fresh zombie blood to work. Run away from the zombies but don't run too far... because the thing that is trying to kill you, has the only thing that will keep you alive! Fast Paced High Intensity Combat Play in the first person perspective as you fight your way through hordes of zombies with a wide range of weapons that you will find as you explore. Hit, stab, chop, burn, and shoot your way through the game in search of the secret lab and the mysterious voice on the other end of the phone guiding you. Open World, Navigation and Exploration Use a compass and street signs to help you as you navigate the open world. Explore indoor areas in search of the items that you will need to complete your quest. Find the Lab, maybe you will find a cure, but most importantly... Have fun, kill as many zombies as you can along the way and see how high you can get your zombie kill counter in this fast paced high intensity game. Zombies... Can't live with them... Can't live without them!
